name: Shift Change
description:
warnings: some flashing images, mentions of death, demons and class struggle. also kinda spoilers for a 1927 film.

music is gray is the sky by three chain links (itch download/bandcamp)

made for bitsy jam #69 (nice): public domain themed. i studied metropolis in high school film so i was legally obligated to make a game about it eventually. it's free on youtube.
